I personally download it for the content that can be mounted for Garry's mod and I never really loved the counter strike series but after playing for a bit I think the game is great. Nice maps, good controls and nice textures for Garry's mod but over all a pretty good game. But just like all multiplayer games, It's always best to have friends.

(slight side note) 
I think this game should be free because then people who play Garry's mod don't have to buy another game just to play on a map with there friends (even though there are CSS texture addons for gmod) and yeah watch this video for reasons why: https://youtu.be/zn30ORDDFXg .

Good game, runs well and is generally really fun. I enjoy it.

This is not a recommendation for CSS as such but for a particular game mode which I've played for nearly 15 years. GunGame. Not turbo GunGame (that's the standard one in CS:GO where you start on level 1 and when you shoot someone a new gun appears immediately in your hand - I'm not a fan) but the classic. 

This is where you start with the most expensive weapon and every round you get a kill you will gain a level and you will spawn with a new (generally worse) weapon until you get to the final levels where you have to get a kill with a single grenade and then finally knife someone. However, after your first kill in a round the only way to gain a level is to find the next gun in the sequence (if someone is a level ahead of you then you can kill them and take their gun) or, most interestingly, knife someone to get a level.

The incentive to knife creates a completely different incentive structure which encourages far more fast paced and multi-path map design. The result, is a social, comedic and deeply skillful experience which any player will enjoy. If you jump on a server and hang out for a while you will make friends as you exchange tales of near misses and congratulate each other on brilliant or hilarious stunts and knife kills. It's a joy to play at any skill level. Come on to the likes of SSDI gg server a few times and I'm sure you will have fun, make friends and have a hilarious time along the way.
